name: Great Comet
description:
"Great Comet" by Lauren Feece & Chris Silva. 2011.
Original acrylic painting/collage on canvas with upcycled wood frame. Signed & dated on the back, ready to hang.
29.5" x 31"

This is an original acrylic painting on canvas collaged with vintage newsprint from a South Side of Chicago newspaper. The richly textured, pleasantly decayed frame is constructed with lumber salvaged from a neighbor's dumpster here in Chicago's Bucktown neighborhood. Soulful & termite free!

SHIPPING
Free shipping shipping within USA.
International shipment available upon special request.

Packed in appropriately sized box with recycled/upcycled packing materials when possible.

All images are copyright of the artist, and it is illegal to reproduce or distribute without permission.

name: Neighborhood Watch; Shift 1
description:
Listing Tools
    Edit
    Copy

Rustic Found Wood Assemblage
Rustic Found Wood Assemblage
zoom
Rustic Found Wood Assemblage Rustic Found Wood Assemblage Rustic Found Wood Assemblage Rustic Found Wood Assemblage Rustic Found Wood Assemblage
"Neighborhood Watch; Shift 1"
Found wood assemblage piece by Lauren Feece & Chris Silva
8.5” x 8.5”

The face was painted by Lauren with acrylic paints on a small piece of bamboo and the rest of the piece is composed of discarded wood collected in Puerto Rico and Chicago. This is the first piece in our small, affordable and insanely popular "Neighborhood Watch" series.

Here, read this advertisement we just produced:

NEIGHBORHOOD WATCH!

Neighborhood hooligans knocking over your trash cans? Gang rumbles in the alley? Dog walkers leaving doggy treats on your lawn? I hear you loud and clear, little buddy! You're fed up and you need a solution, pronto! Simply place this little lady in a strategic location, sit back and watch the crime wave in your area wash away under her vigilant watch! Once the bad seeds in your area realize they're being constantly monitored they'll have no choice but to find other pastures to plant themselves in - GUARANTEED!* Get yours now!

* Guaranteed not to actually happen just because you purchased of this piece...well, probably not anyway.

PRICING
$75 plus shipping

SHIPPING
Packed in appropriately sized box with recycled/upcycled packing materials when possible. Shipped via USPS.

All images are copyright of the artist, and it is illegal to reproduce or distribute without permission.

name: 32nd and Morgan Mural : 47" x 8" Numbered and Signed Print by Mr. Thor
description: Archival Giclée Print Printed on 100% cotton heavyweight matte finish rag paper. The image is produced using quality acid-free materials. Properly displayed under glass in standard indoor lighting, away from direct sunlight, it will preserve its original contrast and color intensity for a lifetime. Seamlessly stitched panorama photographed by Nicky Dieter with a Canon 20D, EF 50mm f/1.8 II lens. Edition: 25 signed and numbered Artist: MR. THOR with assistance from Nick Dieter, Shipwreck, Risk, Yoink, Jack, and the 33rd Latin-Kings. Location: 32nd Place at Morgan, West Bridgeport, Chicago IL. CLICK HERE TO VIEW COMPLETE IMAGE.

name: Scared Crow: 8" x 11" OffSet Print, Signed and Numbered by Brooks Golden
description: 8" x 11". Offset printed on cardstock. Limited edition signed and numbered 1/50. Shipped in sealed in a plastic sleeve.
